Attributes.description: Introduction to diversity of marine habitats and ecosystems; hydrothermal vent, intertidal, coral reef, estuarine, deep sea, and polar ecosystems; impacts of ecosystem change; evolution of ocean plankton; invasive species; climate change; pollution.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of SCIE 001, CHEM 110, CHEM 111, CHEM 120, CHEM 121, CHEM 154.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 15:30, End Time: 17:00, Building: Earth, Room: Sciences
